DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD WATCH : INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS
DOC.TEXT: German Unemployment Down , Marking Recession ' s End : Unemployment in eastern and western Germany fell_in June , reflecting the end of the country ' s recession , the Federal Labor Office said.The unemployment_rate , which is based on unadjusted data , slipped_in the west to 8.0 % from 8.1 % in May . The eastern German jobless rate in June was 14.8 % compared with 15.4 % the previous month because of increased demand for labor , said Labor Office Vice_President Klaus Leven . The statistics reflected increased demand for labor in east .
